title: Hotel Cecil
provenance: Dealer: St. Jivago Desanges, P.O. Box 24 AA2, Los Angeles, CA 90024 (ph: 213/931-1984)
description: Luggage label depicting a crossed spear and shield on a yellow background. An image of the hotel, in line-drawing style, occupies the lower section of the shield. Text, in red, center: HOTEL CECIL; at lower margin: BULAWAYO / SOUTHERN RHODESIA
name: Print
